game_description: The year is 2039 and the planet has recovered after the events of Reflex Unit 1. Life seems safe, until a new larger army of remote control drones suddenly attacks strategic cities around the globe. It is up to you again to pilot a new batch of experimental hardware to fight back the invading forces and save the planet, and beyond... - 1 or 2 Player Campaign - 2 to 4 Player Versus and Survival modes - Cross Platform Multiplayer (iOS, Android, Oculus Platforms, Nintendo Switch) - Game Controller Compatible* *XBOX Game Controller Recommended
review_1: Great game would be perfect with passthrough mode.
review_2: I purchased this a few years ago on oculus Go and was gutted i couldnt down load it on the oculus store for Quest2. Thanks to Sidequestvr.com it's now possible to play this kickass title on Quest2. Just love everything about this game. The camera view and angles are ace. The sound is good. The animations are brilliant. Just a really cool game and something different for VR. What other titles have the Dev's made as I'd like to play more from these dudes. Thanks such a cool game!!!
review_3: For $10, this has got to be one of the best bang for buck games in the oculus store there is. There is a single player campaign, multiplayer vs, coop and survival mode. Please keep updating this game. This is the best top down shooter on quest, hands down, so far!
review_4: controls very well with touch controllers as gamepad, good graphics, awesome perspective in VR as if you're playing a regular game in a holographic projector. Wish there were more such games trying this. it's good, but with just 8 missions there's neither much to do nor enough to do besides the single mechanic from the very beginning: dodge and shoot. I also played in co-op with a few different players, there seems to be enough of them, possibly mobile phone users or from switch...
review_5: This is a great game but Iâ€™ve had trouble playing co-op and online game play. If you could help me resolve this it would be much appreciated.
